entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
